history.narrative: Law 16-300, the “Comprehensive Plan Amendment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-876, which was referred to Committee on the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 5, 2006, and December 19, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28, 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-637 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-300 became effective on March 8, 2007.
